00016 bool DeciderUWBIREDSyncOnAddress::attemptSync(Signal* /*s*/) {
00017   cMessage* encaps = currFrame->getEncapsulatedPacket();
00018   assert(static_cast<MacPkt*>(encaps));
00019   MacPkt* macPkt = static_cast<MacPkt*>(encaps);

00021   return (macPkt->getSrcAddr()==syncAddress);
